paper_abstract: This paper describes the Bar-Ilan system participating in the Recognising Textual Entailment Challenge. The paper proposes first a general probabilistic setting that formalizes the notion of textual entailment. We then describe a concrete alignment-based model for lexical entailment, which utilizes web co-occurrence statistics in a bag of words representation. Finally, we report the results of the model on the Recognising Textual Entailment challenge dataset along with some analysis.
paper_title: A lexical alignment model for probabilistic textual entailment
